resources.string: I do not agree, stop the app
My phone powered down, refresh data

This app will run in the background to track location, but your identity will not be shared. To protect your privacy, the phone will assign itself a random identity code. In addition, the data will be stored in a password protected location.

Please select 'Always allow' in the Location permissions to allow the app to run in the background 
 1. Click the button 'Set location permissions'.
 2. In the menu go to:
 Permissions > Location > Allow all the time
Visit our site for more details about this project
